cs145.kersten.lab2

Class Precipitation

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs145.kersten.lab2.Precipitation

  • public class Precipitation
extends java.lang.Object
    Precipitation reads, stores, and operates on precipitation data loaded from disk. Precipitation's toString method generates a nicely formatted table of the precipitation data.
    Author:
    Andrew Kersten

        private java.lang.String findMax()
        Finds the max rainfall in the precipitation array
        Returns:
        Returns a sentence describing this value and the month and year it occurred

        Returns:

      • readFile

        public void readFile(java.util.Scanner infile)
        Reads the precipitation data and stores that data in a 2D array member. Also calculates the monthly averages and yearly totals.
        Parameters:
        infile - The Scanner object to read the precipitation data from
